title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and other GGUF models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to interact with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components for chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that plugs into the local Ollama server for chat, model management, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing typed wrappers for all Ollama REST endpoints plus streaming utilities.

title: ollama-cli-crystal
summary: Lightweight Crystal-lang CLI that wraps Ollama’s REST API with coloured output and readline prompts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that uses a local Ollama model for inline suggestions and chat inside the editor.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem exposing Ollama chat, generate, pull, and embed APIs with Net::HTTP.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC caching.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-made docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Postgres, and RAG helpers.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of GGUF models tested with Ollama including download stats and example Modelfiles.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-based Slack bot that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-wide conversations with local models.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: Starter repo showing how to combine Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma for retrieval-augmented generation.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that sends selected text or buffer to a local Ollama model and streams the response into a split.

title: ollama-mcp-server
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama chat and generate functions to MCP clients like Claude Desktop.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that connects to Ollama and supports session memory, markdown rendering, and voice input.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial Go client library generated from OpenAPI specs with context-based cancellation and streaming helpers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK targeting .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming and dependency-injection friendly clients.
